name: Quarter Circle Forward PUNCH!
description:
A Slay The Spire mod, inspired mostly by SF2's main characters (also other fighting games). 
 
Currently it adds 32 relics (two need The Artist Mod, one is Custom Mode only), 12 custom game modifiers, 1 event and 1 potion, all in English and simplified Chinese. 
 
v1.0 will have 34+ relics. 
 
Most of the images in this mod are temporary and will be substituted/improved on v1.0.
credits:
Current translations:
 English (Levender) 
 Simplified Chinese (Rita Bernstein) 
 
Original creators of original CC BY 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/) images that 
were then modified by myself for the mod: 
 
Lorc (http://lorcblog.blogspot.com/) - Basis of a lot of boots, Duffel Bag, Fighting Gloves, Handcuffs, Killian Engine Alpha, White Boots and Handcuffs. 
 
Delapouite (http://delapouite.com/) - Basis of Cattail, Dark Gi, Mixed Paint Bucket, Red Gi, Red Headband, School Backpack and Wrestler's Cloak.
 
sbed (https://opengameart.org/users/sbed) - Basis of Necklace of Skulls. 
 
All images above came from http://game-icons.net. 
 
Big thanks for all people who helped with testing, suggestions, ideas and criticism! More detailed thanks at https://github.com/Clauvin/Quarter_Circle_Forward_PUNCH_Mod
